abstract: Quebec Superior Court Justice France Charbonneau's report on corruption in Quebec's construction industry finds it far more prevalent than originally thought; Charbonneau makes 60 recommendations, including term limits for mayors and adoption of anti-corruption legislation based on United States' False Claims Act.
lead_paragraph: The judge who led the commission said the problem “was broader and more deeply rooted than we believed.”

headline.main: Canada: Graft Pervaded Awarding of Contracts in Quebec, Panel Says
headline.print_headline: The Americas; Canada: Graft Pervaded Awarding of Contracts in Quebec, Panel Says

snippet: The judge who led the commission said the problem “was broader and more deeply rooted than we believed.”
